price: a ti, zaista, primaš Kur’an od Mudrog i Sveznajućeg!
arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-innaka latulaqqā al-qur'āna min ladun ḥakīmin ʿalīmin
